mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spider_config ( common_url, url_rule, growth_pattern, start_num, end_num, group_name, item_name, site_name, domain, charset, user_agent, cookies, sleep_time, time_out, thread, match_fields, headers, generated_time )VALUES ( #{commonUrl}, #{urlRule}, #{growthPattern}, #{startNum}, #{endNum}, #{groupName}, #{itemName}, #{siteName}, #{domain}, #{charset}, #{userAgent}, #{cookies}, #{sleepTime}, #{timeOut}, #{thread}, #{matchFields}, #{headers}, #{generatedTime} )
